name: AudioVideoWeb.com
tag_list: streaming-media, flash, silverlight, windows-media, podcast, webcast, pay-per-view, simulated-live, tv-channel
overview: AudioVideoWeb is a leading independent content distribution network of low cost / high quality streaming media services to customers in 45 countries, providing pay-per-view, large event webcasts, simulated live TV/Radio Station technology, ad insertion and placement, DRM, URL protection, chat, podcasting and more – with 24/7 telephone tech support, and month-to-month billing with no long term contract. We welcome startups and small companies. You can ramp your account up, down or even suspend and restart it later it without penalty.
